name: Look On The Bright Side
description:
The other side of the coin - synonym - Opposite. You must slay monsters and the evil forces to defeat the darkness and restore light for the whole map! With perks and consumables to help too! Trade the monsters souls for coins or lights to restore darkness. You only have 1 life - you die, you loose EVERYTHING!

A and D to move left and right

E to use health packs

Kill monsters on the dark side to gain souls, corrupted or evil

Use corrupted souls to convert to coins to buy perks and items

or use them alongside evil souls to buy 5 different lights - collect them all and deposit them in the barrel to win! If you do discord me Roshy#7065
